channel.title: Pokemon Question
channel.description: Well, right now im using a school computer(currently in a computer class at school), so can someone search for a pokemon gold download for vba or computer and post it here. Since almost all sites are blocked for me -.-

item.title: Pokemon Question
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:3, topic:298243”][quote author=`Aaron link=topic=394644.msg2933083#msg2933083 date=1251399862]
We don’t support warez
[/quote]

It’s not so much that we don’t support it, it’s just that it’s illegal and we don’t want any warez on this site, not even links to warez.[/quote]
Exactly. Plus this is for discussions, not making us meet your Pokemon needs.

Read full topic

item.title: Pokemon Question
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

`Aaron:

We don’t support warez

It’s not so much that we don’t support it, it’s just that it’s illegal and we don’t want any warez on this site, not even links to warez.

Micker use a proxy to get around your school blocking websites. Or when you go home tonight get what you need and bring it to school on a flash drive.

Read full topic
